duties_responsibilities.duty: Help patients accomplish treatment plans and therapeutic activities by administering manual physical exercises; instructing, encouraging, and assisting patients in non-manual exercises; ambulatory functional activities, and daily-living activities; as well as applying assistive and supportive quality care.
Assess and interpret evaluations and test results; determine physical therapy treatment plans in consultation with physicians.
Document patient care services by charting in patient and department records in compliance with federal, state, and local legal and professional requirements.
Follow up visits for home health orthopedic patients and continue to meet eligibility requirements for home health services maintenance therapy.

education_certification.credential: Graduation from an accredited Assistant Therapy Assistant Program. California state licensure. 1 year of home health experience as a physical therapist Assistant. Valid Drivers license and clean DMV.
